metadata.name: Choices
metadata.description:
Choices are what life is all about. Good and evil, altruism and egoism, to laugh or to cry.
In the end, we make choices each and every day of our lifes, so what are we without the possibility to choose?
Choices is a piece meant to convey one simple, yet powerful message... The choices we make today will act as guidelines for the path we shall follow.
